summary: A unit‑test collection that verifies the correct handling of wire specifications—such as slices, lists, NumPy arrays and integer indices—when applying quantum gates and circuit operations, covering barriers, conditionals, initialization, multi‑register actions, measurements and out‑of‑range error cases.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the quantum circuit framework’s gate‑application logic on various wire configurations, thereby supporting stable quantum software development and reducing runtime errors.
